participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and responsible, Emily is excited yet a bit anxious about her upcoming triplets. She is dedicated to her family and work.
participant_1.background: i'm expecting triplets in three months. a already have a step children. i recently moved to this country. i just moved into my first home. i work at a school.

participant_2.name: Laura
participant_2.personality: Friendly and nurturing, Laura loves sharing her interests with others and enjoys the simple pleasures in life.
participant_2.background: i enjoy gardening and walking outdoors. i work as a school teacher. i am a woman. i attend church every week. i've a dogs.
